analysis.description:
RewardSharing.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol#237-248) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(ERC20Address).transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol#245-248)
Parameter 'ERC20Address' of RewardSharing.ProfitTokenDividend (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol#194-195) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'ERC20Address' of RewardSharing.AdjustTokenBook (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol#210) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'ERC20Address' of RewardSharing.CheckTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol#232-233) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'ERC20Address' of RewardSharing.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol#240) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_IsWithdrawActive' of RewardSharing.UpdateActive (/unique_chucks/4/0x8144e51d81c5d5cf6ed8318942315659bc035c18.sol) is not in mixedCase
